name: rikurou
normalized: annerose, breakfast is ready!
i call annerose after cooking breakfast as usual.

name: annerose
normalized: yeah, be right there.
answering right away, annerose turns up at the dinner table.
she's back in her everyday outfit after her shower.
her slightly damp hair is quite attractive.

name: annerose
normalized: and today we're having… oh, not bad.
omelettes.

name: rikurou
normalized: they're fried potato and bacon.
i've got miso soup with green onion and burdock, too.

name: annerose
normalized: you've really got a knack for stuff like this.
nice work.
annerose praises me as she takes her seat.

name: rikurou
normalized: only because i've had to cook a lot for myself.
i dish up a bowl of rice and pass it to her.
naturally it's a big helping.

name: annerose
normalized: where's michiko?
i could have sworn she was up for a change…"
annerose asks with a puzzled look as she takes her bowl.
i guess she doesn't remember laying us out since she was still half-asleep.

name: rikurou
normalized: i thought she was lurking around here too, but… maybe not?
either way it's quieter without her.

name: annerose
normalized: you two really know how to get under each others' skin, don't you?
why don't you try getting along for a change?

name: rikurou
normalized: no, i… she's always the one coming after me or trying to bash my head in with an axe.

name: annerose
normalized: …well, whatever.
i don't really want to deal with herthis early anyway, either.
time to eat!

name: michiko
normalized: hoold iit!
the door's nearly kicked off its hinges as michiko reveals herself.
she comes marching in with axes… scratch that, a pot in both hands.

name: annerose
normalized: what's all the shouting about?
are you having breakfast t-- ggh.
she was about to say "too?
" but pinched her nose shut and reeled back.

name: rikurou
normalized: ugh… this smell…"

name: annerose
normalized: i've got a bad feeling about this…"

name: michiko
normalized: annerose!
i won't let you eat another bite of this stupid human's cooking!

name: michiko
normalized: behold the breakfast that none other than i have prepared!
now feast!
michiko proudly declares and tears the lid off the pot she'd set on the table.

name: rikurou
normalized: woah!
a mephitic vapor rises from within.
there were no words to fully describe the rotten, stinging, and yet somehow burned stench.

name: annerose
normalized: wh-what the heck is this!?
annerose jumps out of her chair.
fearing michiko's creation may infect her food, she tightly holds the rice and miso soup in one hand and the omelette in the other.

name: michiko
normalized: 'what the heck' nothing!
i spent three days and nights cooking this just for you!

name: michiko
normalized: come come, throw away that stupid human's filth.
try this instead, it's delicious!
saying so, michiko ladles out a serving of the purple glop.

name: annerose
normalized: i can't say that i agree… uwah.
the soup that splashed on the table when she set it down kicked up white smoke like sulfuric acid.

name: annerose
normalized: even a witch's brew isn't this bad.
rick, the window, get the window!

name: rikurou
normalized: a-already on it.
i didn't even need her to tell me as i threw open the kitchen window all the way.

name: michiko
normalized: don't try to mess this up, stupid human.
oh, i bet you're afraid of me stealing the only thing you're good for around here!

name: rikurou
normalized: where'd you get that from?
everything you've cooked so far has been a living curse.
don't forget about the time i was bedded for three days after a mouthful of your crap, you!

name: michiko
normalized: hmph, you should've just dropped dead…"

name: rikurou
normalized: whatever.
the stuff today looks just as lethal and you still want to serve it to annerose?

name: michiko
normalized: whaat!?
now you've done it you stupid human, there's no going back!
not that i'd let you off anyway, but this time you're dead!
michiko draws her axes from her skirt in a rage.
damn it, not this again you stupid maid!

name: annerose
normalized: michiko, enough!
annerose stops her just before the axe is thrown.

name: michiko
normalized: whaa?
but the stupid human started it!

name: annerose
normalized: no buts!
just give it a rest and let me have breakfast in peace and quiet for once.

name: michiko
normalized: nngh…"
michiko begrudgingly puts away her axes.

name: annerose
normalized: sigh… still, it was nice of you to cook something for me.
thanks.

name: michiko
normalized: oh!?
then here, have some!
eat!

name: annerose
normalized: uwah… hold on.
did you do a taste test on this?

normalized: …taste test?
michiko looks puzzled.

name: michiko
normalized: what's a taste test?
is it like a quiz or something?
oh, lord.

name: annerose
normalized: no, no this… soup?
did you test this stuff yourself before serving it to me?

name: michiko
normalized: nope.

name: annerose
normalized: and why not!?

name: michiko
normalized: well, you're the one who's going to be eating it, right?
i'm not having any, and of course the stupid human won't be getting any either.

name: annerose
normalized: sigh…"
annerose lets out a deep, deep sigh.

name: annerose
normalized: then how would you know it tastes good?
wait, how did you even make this?
what did you use for ingredients?

name: michiko
normalized: ingredients?
hmm… what did go in there…"
michiko tilts her head with an expression of wholehearted wonder.

name: rikurou
normalized: i don't think she remembers.

name: annerose
normalized: give me a break…"
annerose exchanges whispers with me.

name: annerose
normalized: listen michiko.
when you cook, you have to carefully consider what goes in to what you're trying to make.
also, never forget to do a taste test, either.

name: michiko
normalized: do i have to?

name: annerose
normalized: yes.
sorry, but that pot needs to go.

name: michiko
normalized: but, here just one spoonful…"

name: annerose
normalized: n.
o.

name: michiko
normalized: oohh～～"

name: rikurou
normalized: serves you right.
it's a hundred years too early for you to even think of making something for annerose.

name: michiko
normalized: what was that!?

name: annerose
normalized: don't start with her, rick!
michiko didn't know the first thing about cooking before she came here so it's not her fault!

name: rikurou
normalized: …s-sorry.
i fall silent under annerose's glare.

name: michiko
normalized: nyah nyah, idiot.

name: rikurou
normalized: why you…"

name: annerose
normalized: if you two don't cut it out i'm going to get angry.

name: rikurou
normalized: m-ma'am.

name: michiko
normalized: u-understood.
we both cover our heads, remembering this morning.
michiko's disturbing cooking.
annerose told me a while back that in the world michiko's from, cooking and eating stuff doesn't seem to be the custom.
not to mention the higher beings of that world apparently don't even need to eat to survive at all.
-- so as one of these higher beings, (so she says, but i don't buy it,) michiko honestly doesn't know a frypan from a bedpan.
this doesn't stop her from wanting to prepare meals for annerose though, the inevitable result of which being these countless weird dishes… no, these eldritch "things.

name: annerose
normalized: sigh… rick, do we still have stuff for omelettes left?

name: rikurou
normalized: huh?
we do, but… yeah they've cooled off.
should i make some more?

name: annerose
normalized: i'm fine with this.
make one for michiko.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…?

name: michiko
normalized: whaa!?
what?
why!?
annerose!
i'll never eat anything that stupid--"

normalized: yes, you will.
you need to figure out what good food tastes like first.

normalized: also, you're prohibited from cooking until i say otherwise.

that goes for you too, rick.

name: michiko
normalized: no waay…"

name: rikurou
normalized: umm… will this be for every meal from now on…?

name: annerose
normalized: what's with the look?
cooking for one more won't killyou.
hurry up, we're waiting on you.

name: rikurou
normalized: sigh…"
feeling like somebody just dropped an anvil on me, i turn back to the kitchen to go make one for michiko.

name: michiko
normalized: damn iit, don't think this means you've won!

name: rikurou
normalized: shaddap, it's not like i'm cooking for you 'cause i want to.

name: michiko
normalized: what was that you stupid filthy human?

name: rikurou
normalized: you wanna go, stupid maid?

name: annerose
normalized: i'm hungry here…"
i hear a menacing voice and the sound of kongo yasha being drawn behind me.

name: michiko
normalized: y-yes!

name: rikurou
normalized: at once, ma'am!
michiko and i scramble into the kitchen.
and so our exciting breakfast came to an end.
i prepare the customary post-meal coffee for myself and annerose, plus begrudgingly one more cup for michiko.

name: annerose
normalized: whew, this is great.
your cooking's fine by itself, but your coffee's really a world apart.

name: rikurou
normalized: thankee♪

name: annerose
normalized: michiko, make sure you take notes on this.

name: michiko
normalized: yeah yeah, you don't need to keep saying it, this is what "good" coffee tastes like.
damn it, why do i have to drink this stupid human's puddle water…"
michiko grumbles while sipping the coffee to uncover the secrets of good flavor.
well, drink all you like.
brewing a good cup of coffee is even harder than cooking you know, heh heh.

name: annerose
normalized: hmhm… by the way rick, have we got any jobs today?

name: rikurou
normalized: oh, yes, two cases in fact.
investigating some trouble at a warehouse and a missing cat hunt.
i pull myself back to the present with a nod.

name: annerose
normalized: hmm… a warehouse investigation and a missing cat…"
annerose runs a detective agency here on the brink of the human world and demon world in amidahara.
that said, we rarely get your typical missing person cases or affair investigations like a normal "outside" detective would.
she is, after all, the peerless wielder of the legendary demon blade kongo yasha.
requests of that variety come in like crazy.
take missing person cases.
we end up looking for someone, but it's because a leader of the amidahara underworld asks us to find a traitor to their organization.
or on the flipside, serving as a bodyguard to said traitor so they can get out of amidahara safely.
we get those too.
we also handle exchanges of the "myriad vices" particular to this city between the "inside" and "outside," and organizations and individuals alike.
in these instances, annerose acts as the neutral partyrunner.
of course when something with the exchange goes wrong like getting ambushed (which happens a lot) it's her job to cut them down.
a name well known among amidahara's elite, yet belonging to no organization.
that is annerose.
some allies, but more than a few enemies.
but that's okay.
the point is, when it comes to the dark belly of the underworld or a good old fashioned throwdown, she's got it covered.
but… as a detective.
annerose is adamant on that point.
i asked a while ago why, but all i got was "because that's what i am.
can't really say i get it, but there you go.
so written in magic script on the front gate for those who can see it is, "annerose detective agency.
i can't see it myself, actually.
yup.
anyway, the one who spits in the face of hypocrisy, the champion of honest demons, the slayer of wicked evil, witch detective annerose.
it sounds like some manga ripoff, but honestly even crazier things happen all the time here in amidahara.
just take what happened to me…

name: rikurou
normalized: it's been awhile since we've had a nice, detective-like job.

name: annerose
normalized: you think?
annerose tilts her head a bit.

name: annerose
normalized: warehouse trouble sounds slow enough as it is, but i really don't feel like going off on some cat hunt.
forget it.

name: rikurou
normalized: indeed, it's not up your alley.

name: annerose
normalized: what do you mean it's 'not up my alley?
' i want to hear this.
she shoots me a look with her arms crossed.
yikes.

name: rikurou
normalized: e-er, nevermind.
then i take it we'll be declining the missing cat case?

name: annerose
normalized: hmm… i wonder…"
after looking off into space and thinking a moment,

me?
by myself?

normalized: keh heh heh, looks to me like the stupid human's moreof a scaredy-cat.

she's smirking like she's made a total fool out of me.
